scripts.db:start: docker volume create rxwatch_postgres_data 2>/dev/null || true && docker compose up -d
scripts.db:dump: docker exec rxwatch-db pg_dump -U rxwatch rxwatch > db/dumps/rxwatch-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i rxwatch-db psql -U rxwatch rxwatch <
scripts.db:reset: docker compose down && docker volume rm rxwatch_postgres_data 2>/dev/null || true && docker volume create rxwatch_postgres_data && docker compose up -d
